channel.title: Starting a webclient development team for an easier way to make a webclent
channel.description: [wip] The webclient project [wip] Spots available 2. I had posted a topid once on how to make a webclient "the easy way" with promotionsoft's web game builder. however i didn't realize that most webhosts (t35 webhosting is sometimes an exception) do not allow you to use it because it is zipped. I think chmodding is part of the problem but i also want to get some help from actual client coders. I need people who can do both 317 - 508. Just reach me through moparscape pming or my gtalk account (you need to get a gtalk if you wanna chat with me, thewebclient@gmail.com is my gtalk e-mail). You will recieve a percentage of credit due to the amount of work is enlisted. ELITISTS ONLY. I also need someone to get the full version of web game builder for us, that person would be made a mod on anything that i controll.

item.title: Starting a webclient development team for an easier way to make a webclent
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

[wip] The webclient project [wip]
Spots available 2.
I had posted a topid once on how to make a webclient “the easy way” with promotionsoft’s web game builder. however i didn’t realize that most webhosts (t35 webhosting is sometimes an exception) do not allow you to use it because it is zipped. I think chmodding is part of the problem but i also want to get some help from actual client coders. I need people who can do both 317 - 508. Just reach me through moparscape pming or my gtalk account (you need to get a gtalk if you wanna chat with me, thewebclient@gmail.com is my gtalk e-mail). You will recieve a percentage of credit due to the amount of work is enlisted. ELITISTS ONLY. I also need someone to get the full version of web game builder for us, that person would be made a mod on anything that i controll.
